properties.entry: SELECT SP.ID AS ID, SP.NAME AS NAME, CASE WHEN SP.PARENT IS NULL THEN 'root' ELSE SP.PARENT END AS PARENT_ID, SP.TYPE AS TYPE, CASE WHEN SP.TYPE = 'Module' THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS CANCHECK, CASE WHEN SP.TYPE = 'Module' THEN '/statics/images/icon_module.gif' ELSE '/statics/images/icon_page.gif' END AS ICON_PATH FROM SEC_PERMISSION SP WHERE SP.TYPE IN ('Module', 'Page')
